QuestData.Title: An Exquisite Earring
QuestData.Description: You unhook the earring off the furry creature's ear. It looks like he was having some fun wearing the dangly hoop. TOO much fun.$B$BPerhaps the owner of this dainty bauble would like to see it returned. You don't have to tell her where you found it... or who was wearing it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Exquisite Earring to Tina Mudclaw at Haohan's House or Halfhill Market in the Valley of the Four Winds.
